_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five foundations of meditation [mn20: Some foundation of meditation that gives rise to bad, unskillful thoughts connected with desire, hate, and delusion
Some other foundation of meditation connected with the skillful
Examining the drawbacks of those thoughts
Trying to ignore and forget about those thoughts
Focusing on stopping the formation of thoughts
The ways of thought (a causal sequence): Focusing on some foundation of meditation that gives rise to bad, unskillful thoughts connected with desire, hate, and delusion
Focusing on some other foundation of meditation connected with the skillful
Examining the drawbacks of those thoughts
Trying to ignore and forget about those thoughts
Focusing on stopping the formation of thoughts
Squeezing, squashing, and torturing mind with mind
